transArray.content: The room is clean, the self-service laundry is very convenient, and the breakfast is okay. There is also a breakfast shop nearby. There is free coffee on the first floor of the hotel, which is very convenient for me ~ The front desk service is also very warm. It rained when I left. The front desk staff was considerate and held an umbrella. I can feel the staff. of intentions
No words can be worth your recognition. Xiao Jiâ€™s goal is to get your recognition. I hope you can introduce Xiao Ji to more of your friends.
